column4: some one, would you like to give me a download link to a downloadable tarball package those could work with xfce4-terminal on xubuntu 11.10? thanks before...
no, i mena, a link that contains a installable tarball package
or could you teach me how to install a tarball?
what do you want to install?
you do not need to install from tarball though
you can do        sudo apt-get install kanatest
ok wait i though my GTK+ doesn't upgraded yet... it stop after ./configure... it can't do "make"...
ok you better try          sudo apt-get install kanatest
usually when you install something with apt-get, you see something like These programs will be installed: libasd libasdf2 and so on
here you can see what is needed: http://pkgs.org/ubuntu-11.04/ubuntu-universe-i386/kanatest_0.4.8-2_i386.deb.html#requires
do try      sudo apt-get build-dep kanatest
